  • Constructor Details

    • Lesson

      public Lesson(String topic, String content, int teacherID)
      Constructor for creating a new lesson plan (date and materialID is auto-set).
      Parameters:
      topic - The topic of the lesson
      content - The actual content of the lesson
      teacherID - The ID of the teacher

    • Lesson

      public Lesson(String topic, String content, Instant lastModifiedDate, int teacherID, int materialID)
      Constructor for lesson content. Use this constructor to access the date and materialID.
      Parameters:
      topic - The topic of the lesson
      content - The actual content of the lesson
      lastModifiedDate - The timestamp of when the lesson was last modified
      teacherID - The ID of the teacher
      materialID - The ID of the material
